text: “(Allah) adzati (pa tsiku la chiweruziro): “Lowani ku Moto pamodzi ndi mibadwo imene idamuka kale (inu musanabwere) yochokera m’ziwanda ndi mu anthu. M’badwo uliwonse pamene uzikalowa, udzatembelera unzake, kufikira pamene onse adzasonkhana m’menemo. Adzanena apambuyo kwa oyambilira awo: “Mbuye wathu! Awa, adatisokeretsa. Apatseni chilango cha Moto chochuluka.” (Allah) adzanena: “Aliyense mwa inu akhala ndi chilango chochuluka; koma izi inu simukudziwa.”
